price: Bã Ni nufln (sãmun) wani arziki daga gare su, Bã Ni nufin su (yi Mini hidimar) ciyar da Ni.*
arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطۡعِمُونِ
footnotes: * Bã Ni nufin su sãmo Mini abinci, kuma bã Ni nufin su dafa Mini abinci.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: mā urīdu min'hum min riz'qin wamā urīdu an yuṭ'ʿimūni
